窱窱窱

窱字的基本解释

窱
tiǎo
〔杳窱〕深远、深邃的样子。亦作“窈窱”、“窅窱”。

窱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiǎo］
［《廣韻》土了切，上篠，透。］
［《廣韻》他弔切，去嘯，透。］
见“窱”、“窱裊”。

窱字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窱； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页867第14
【集韻】徒弔切，音調。杳窱也。又深遠貌。通作窕。【荀子·賦論篇】充盈太宇而不窕。【註】窕讀爲窱，深貌。【張衡·西京賦】望䆗窱以徑廷。【註】深邃貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他弔切，音糶。又【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?土了切，眺上聲。義?同。

窱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
窱字的起名意思

暂无。

窱
Basic explanation of words
窱
tiǎo
〔杳窱〕Profound and profound look. Also known as "窈窱" and "窅窱".
窱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiǎo］
["Guangyun" cuts the earth and cuts, on the small, through. ]
["Guangyun" he hangs and cuts, screams, and penetrates. ]
See "窱", "窱袅".
窱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窱; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 867 14
【Jiyun】Only hanging and cutting, tones. Yeah. And far-reaching. The pass is made. [Xunzi·Fu Lun Chapter] To fill the universe without being slender. [Note] The 窕 is read as 窱, and it is deep. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Wang Tuoqi is a path to court. [Note] Profound appearance.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? He hangs and cuts, the sound is 粜. [Guang Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? The soil is cut, and the voice is over. Righteous? Same.
窱

窱
Name meaning
Nothing.
tiǎo, tiào
только в сочетаниях
